Text:
1.Download Ubisoft game launcher Link: http://thepiratebay.org/search/ubisoft%20launcher/0/99/0.

2.install then go find it in C:/ program files.

3.copy the contents of orbit (the folder in this download) into the ubisoft game launcher folder replacing everything.

4. then download directX updates and install Link: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/confirmation.aspx?id=35.

5. Run ACRSP.exe and wait for the black screen it might take a minute then play !

Let me know if it works for u like this .. Credits to lordy for ubisoft hint
